products.title: Stockholm Mocha Brown Roller Blind
products.description: Stockholm mocha brown is a soft milk coffee shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm mocha brown roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

products.title: Oslo Blackout Latte Brown Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft latte brown roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Unicolour Fr Taupe Brown Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for earthy, natural tones their unicolour fr taupe brown should be first choice. Light filtering & resistent to moisture. Their stunning unicolour range has been designed specifically with office & work environments in mind. The collection includes everything from subtle muted shades to well satured bright colour options. products.title: Splash Taupe Brown Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash taupe brown electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The soft light brown roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.
